content.question: 1 Caesar acceptis litteris hora circiter XI diei statim nuntium in Bellovacos ad M. Crassum quaestorem mittit, cuius hiberna aberant ab eo milia passuum XXV; iubet media nocte legionem proficisci celeriterque ad se venire. Exit cum nuntio Crassus. Alterum ad Gaium Fabium legatum mittit, ut in Atrebatium fines legionem adducat, 5 qua sibi iter faciendum sciebat. Scribit Labieno, si rei publicae commodo facere posset, cum legione ad fines Nerviorum veniat. Reliquam partem exercitus, quod paulo aberat longius, non putat exspectandam; equites circiter quadringentos ex proximis hibernis colligit. Bellum Gallicum 5.46 Answer the following questions in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question. 1. What is the direct object of mittit (line 2) ? Write your answer in Latin. 2. How did someone become a quaestor in Republican Rome? 3. According to lines 2-3 (iubet . . . venire), what did Caesar order Crassus to do? 4. What kind of dative is sibi (line 5) ? 5. (A) Translate in context Reliquam partem exercitus (line 6) and (B) identify the case of exercitus. 6. According to lines 7-8 (equites . . . colligit), from where did Caesar gather his cavalry?
